response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable and worth $1,000,000 to you. I understand the immense value this product holds for you and I am confident it will meet all your expectations.

To make this acquisition possible, I am offering you the chance to purchase this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to secure such a significant asset without compromising on its worth.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you may have and assist you through the process.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
